layman_description: Specialized ammunition with increased muzzle velocity for higher damage.
technical_description: Ammo variant with ballistic coefficient and kinetic energy boost.
player_impact: Bullets travel faster and hit harder at all distances.

layman_description: Designed ammunition that expands on impact for devastating wounds.
technical_description: Ammo type with expansion damage multiplier and bleed application.
player_impact: Shots cause severe bleeding and deal extra damage to enemies.

layman_description: Hardened ammunition that penetrates through protective gear.
technical_description: Ammo with armor penetration chance and hardened projectile properties.
player_impact: Ignore armor on zombies and penetrate through multiple targets.

layman_description: Glowing ammunition that shows projectile flight path visually.
technical_description: Ammo variant with visual trajectory and target illumination effect.
player_impact: See exactly where your shots are traveling for better aim adjustment.

layman_description: Ammunition that ignites on impact and causes fire damage.
technical_description: Fire ammo with ignition chance and burning damage over time.
player_impact: Shots set zombies on fire causing sustained damage.

layman_description: Frozen projectiles that slow and freeze enemies on contact.
technical_description: Cold ammo with freeze chance and movement speed reduction.
player_impact: Shots slow zombies down making them easier to manage.

layman_description: Conductive ammunition that shocks enemies and nearby zombies.
technical_description: Energy ammo with chain effect and electrical damage radius.
player_impact: Shots electrocute enemies and nearby undead simultaneously.

layman_description: Poisonous projectiles that apply venom to struck enemies.
technical_description: Poison ammo with toxin application and damage degradation.
player_impact: Enemies take ongoing poison damage long after being hit.

layman_description: Ammunition with built-in explosives for area damage on impact.
technical_description: Explosive ammo with blast radius and detonation force.
player_impact: Shots explode dealing damage to nearby enemies.

layman_description: Cutting-edge ammo that creates a shockwave stunning all nearby zombies.
technical_description: Energy ammo with stun radius and crowd control effect.
player_impact: Shots stun groups of enemies temporarily immobilizing them.

layman_description: Chemical compound that speeds up weapon and armor deterioration on enemies.
technical_description: Consumable with degradation application and durability reduction factor.
player_impact: Damage enemy equipment making them weaker over time.

layman_description: Biological agent that causes zombie infection or weakness symptoms.
technical_description: Medical item with infection application and immune system debuff.
player_impact: Apply infections to enemies reducing their combat effectiveness.

layman_description: Tech device that scrambles zombie ai causing erratic behavior.
technical_description: Equipment with AI disruption and confusion effect duration.
player_impact: Confused zombies attack each other or wander aimlessly.

layman_description: Tool that resets zombie behavior patterns forcing aggression resets.
technical_description: Equipment with threat memory clearing and awareness reset.
player_impact: Makes tracked zombies forget about you temporarily.

layman_description: Substance that makes zombies more aggressive toward each other.
technical_description: Consumable with infighting chance and aggression boost multiplier.
player_impact: Zombies fight themselves instead of attacking you.

layman_description: Gas canister that blinds and deafens zombies in area.
technical_description: Throwable item with sensory denial and detection range reduction.
player_impact: Affected zombies lose sight and hearing becoming ineffective.

layman_description: Chemical that prevents zombie regeneration and healing entirely.
technical_description: Poison with healing block and regeneration immunity duration.
player_impact: Prevent zombies from healing their wounds.

layman_description: Causes infected enemies to mutate into stronger dangerous forms.
technical_description: Consumable with mutation trigger and tier escalation chance.
player_impact: Transform normal zombies into elite threat variants.

layman_description: Scent marker that makes zombies track and follow a target relentlessly.
technical_description: Equipment with pheromone application and tracking persistence.
player_impact: Mark targets for zombies to hunt relentlessly.

layman_description: Biological weapon that spreads disease between nearby zombies.
technical_description: Consumable with plague transmission and contagion radius.
player_impact: Disease spreads from zombie to zombie killing groups.
